mapper.select: select H.ORDER_HISTORY_ID, H.ORDER_NUMBER, H.ORDER_STATUS, H.ORIGIN_PRICE, H.USED_POINT, H.DONATION_PRICE, H.FINAL_PAY_PRICE, H.ECO_DEAL_QR_URL, H.MEMBER_ID, H.CREATED_AT, P.ORDER_PRODUCT_ID, P.PRICE, P.QUANTITY, P.CANCEL_STATUS, P.ORDER_TYPE, P.PRODUCT_ID, P.DISCOUNT_PRICE from ORDER_HISTORY H join ORDER_PRODUCT P on H.ORDER_HISTORY_ID = P.ORDER_HISTORY_ID where H.MEMBER_ID = #{member_id}
